H0.text: What is the name of a triangle which has sides unequal in length. Asymmetric

H1.text: What is the name of a triangle which has sides unequal in length. Heterogeneous

H2.text: What is the name of a triangle which has sides unequal in length. Anisotropic

H3.text: What is the name of a triangle which has sides unequal in length. Scalene

A4.text: A triangle with three different-length sides is a scalene triangle.
